screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .qoi file in ImageMagick
screenshot.caption: QOI file open in ImageMagick

description: In November 2021, developer Dominic Szablewski released the QOI format. The format is intended to be an open-source format that is easier to implement and faster to use than PNG.

Specifically, QOI images can be encoded 20 to 50 times faster than similar-sized PNG images, and they can be decoded 3 to 4 times faster. Each QOI image includes a 14-byte header, which identifies the image as a QOI file and specifies the image's width, height, included channels, and colorspace.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .qoi file in ImageMagick
